formulas.name: occupancy_sensors_space_types_formula
formulas.value: ( [ 'Storage area','Storage area - refrigerated','Hospital - medical supply'].include?(standard_space_type_name) and floor_area < 100.0) or ( 'Office - enclosed' == standard_space_type_name and floor_area < 25.0) ? true : false
